CustomField.formula: ( (grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__c = null && grax__Execution_Unique_Key__c != null) || ( ( NOT(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Is_Running__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Status__c, 'Completed - Errors sending data')) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < TODAY() - 15 ) || ( grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Execution_Unique_Key_Helper__c != grax__Execution_Unique_Key__c && NOT(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Is_Running__c) ) || ( grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Can_Delete_GRAX_Records__c && NOT(ISPICKVAL(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Status__c, 'Completed - Errors sending data')) && ( ISPICKVAL(grax__Status__c, 'Sent Successful') || ( ISPICKVAL(grax__Status__c, 'Not Sent') && NOT(grax__GRAX_Schedule_Process__r.grax__Is_Running__c) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Can Delete GRAX Record?
